/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds that add a serene touch to the urban landscape. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. A few cars can be seen parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. In the distance, a building with a distinctive red roof stands out against the blue sky, adding a splash of color to the otherwise green and blue palette of the image. The image beautifully captures the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
